name: Alex Baranowski
bio: RHCE currently aiming for RHCA. I'm spending my best years in a console, so I know a thing or two about Linux :). Enjoy working for a small company where I automate the process of making Linux distro. Some folks call me DevOps.

name: Andoni Alonso
bio: SRE that loves work from the console. Some people say that I have a shellscript for everything. Always learning.
